Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Maybe she refused to use that frame because of the hairstyle... What do you think, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's get rid of the twin tails then.", 3: '6', 4: "Let's observe for a while more.", 5: '6'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I don't think Lucia hates the twin tails.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv, do you know something?', 3: '9', 4: 'Then why would Lucia want to remodel the frame?', 5: '9'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I saw her looking at her own reflection in the mirror for quite some time when she first received the new frame.', 4: '1'}
{1: '100', 2: 'There are mirrors in this base?!', 3: '13', 4: 'Lucia was admiring her own reflection?!', 5: '14'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Why are you so surprised? We brought back some as resources before.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "And she's still a girl, isn't it normal to look at her own reflection?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "If Lucia really didn't like the twin tails, she would've changed her frame back immediately.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So the question is, why would Lucia want to remodel the frame?', 4: '1'}
{1: '101', 2: "Maybe she thinks it's too childish.", 3: '22', 4: "Because it doesn't look strong.", 5: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The frame performance is good... but the twin tails are a no.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "The twin tails... They don't really suit me, do they?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, I know what kind of impression I leave.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And such a girly and cute hairstyle like twin tails...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I think it really suits you, Lucia.', 3: '31', 4: "It's not that bad.", 5: '31'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I also think twin tails suit you, Lucia. If you don't mind, why don't you try it on again?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Do you think so too, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
